specials.name: Exacting Strike
specials.description: Requirements Krossrani has a Multiple Attack Penalty

specials.name: Shielded Stride
specials.description: Requirements Krossrani has Raised his shield this turn

specials.name: Raise Shield
specials.description: Krossrani gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of his next turn.

specials.name: Intimidating Strike
specials.description: Krossrani makes a Strike. If it hits, the target is Frightened 1. If it’s a critical success, it is instead Frightened 2.

specials.name: Bravery
specials.description: When Krossrani rolls a success at a Will save against a fear effect, he gets a critical success instead. In addition, anytime he gains the frightened condition, reduce its value by 1.
